flawed_nl_solution:
3000 new bees are born every day. In 7 days there will be 3000*7=<<3000*7=21000>>21000 new bees
If each day the queen loses 900 bees, in 7 days there will be 900*7=<<900*7=6030>>6030 fewer bees
If at the beginning the queen had 12500 bees, then at the end of 7 days she will have 12500+21000-6030=<<12500+21000-6030=27470>>27470 bees
The total number of bees in the hive including the queen is 27470+1 =<<27470+1=27471>>27471
#### 27471

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 6300, not 6030. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
